rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 560px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
